state.response: امریکہ کے پاس دنیا میں سب سے زیادہ جوہری بجلی گھر ہیں۔
claims: America has the most nuclear power plants in the world.

state.response: امریکہ کے پاس دنیا میں سب سے زیادہ جوہری بجلی گھر ہیں۔
claims: America has the most nuclear power plants in the world.

America has the most nuclear power plant: Which country has the most nuclear power plants? Number of nuclear power plants by country

The United States has the most operational nuclear reactors on the planet – 96. Together they have a capacity of 97,565 MW, and last year nuclear energy made up about 20% of the country's electricity generation.
Which country has the most nuclear power plants? Number of nuclear power plants by country
Nuclear power plants operate in 32 countries and generate about a tenth of the world's electricity. Most are in Europe, North America and East Asia.

The United States has the most nuclear power reactors in the world, at 96 total, generating over 800 terawatts of zero-emissions electricity per year.
